```
from microdot import Microdot

app = Microdot()

@app.get('/')
async def index(request):
    return {'hello': 'world'}

app.run(debug=True) 
```

```
api = Microdot()

@api.get('/users')
async def get_users():
    pass

main_app = Microdot()
main_app.mount(api, url_prefix='/api')  # /api/users route is added to main_app 
```
